verbs.description: [ARG0: The Trump 2020 campaign manager] [V: sent] [ARG1: the letter] [ARGM-DIR: out] [ARGM-LOC: on Twitter] . It received hundreds of retweets in minutes .
The Trump 2020 campaign manager sent the letter out on Twitter . [ARG0: It] [V: received] [ARG1: hundreds of retweets] [ARGM-TMP: in minutes] .
